sokobangame.model.objects
Class Arrow

java.lang.Object
  sokobangame.model.MazeObject
      sokobangame.model.objects.Arrow

public class Arrow
extends MazeObject

The object representing push-arrows in the maze. Arrows act as walls unless the player moves onto them in the direction of the arrow, in which case they will modify the player's move to try and end on the other side of the arrow from the player.

modifyPlayerMovement

public java.awt.Point modifyPlayerMovement(Player player,
                                           MazeObject.Direction playerDirection,
                                           java.awt.Point destination)
Description copied from class: MazeObject
Called when the player tries to move into this object's tile. The returned Point is where the player will now attempt to go. As such, returning the passed destination is the 'continue unchanged' option. This method does not affect whether the player can occupy this object's tile should it not be directed to a different destination.

Overrides:
modifyPlayerMovement in class MazeObject
